text: Gilbert C. Bartosh, Sr. (May 21, 1930 – June 4, 2016) was an American football player and coach.U.S. Public Records Index, Vols 1 & 2 (Provo, UT: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc.), 2010. He served as the head football coach at the University of Texas at El Paso (UTEP) from 1974 to 1975, with a record of 6–28. He was born in Granger, Texas. He died in Liberty Hill, Texas, aged 86. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:BC Lions players Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Gil Bartosh
